settings.section_subtitle: Real results from real people managing their glucose and energy

settings.text: I've tried so many fitness apps, but RangeFit is the first one that actually understands my body. The AI recommendations are spot-on, and I haven't had an energy crash in weeks!
settings.author: Sarah M.

settings.text: As someone with pre-diabetes, finding the right workout timing was always a struggle. RangeFit takes the guesswork out. I finally feel in control of my energy levels.
settings.author: Jessica L.

settings.text: The community is amazing! It's so helpful to connect with others who understand the glucose-fitness connection. Plus, the workouts are actually fun and doable!
settings.author: Maria G.

settings.section_subtitle: Everything you need to know about RangeFit

settings.question: How does RangeFit work?
settings.answer: RangeFit uses AI to personalize workouts based on your glucose patterns. Simply log your energy levels before and after workouts, and our AI learns what works best for your body.

settings.question: Can I cancel anytime?
settings.answer: Yes! You can cancel your subscription anytime with no fees or penalties. Your access will continue until the end of your billing period.

settings.question: Is RangeFit suitable for beginners?
settings.answer: Absolutely! RangeFit is designed for all fitness levels. Our workouts include modifications for beginners, and the AI adapts to your current fitness level.

settings.question: Do I need special equipment?
settings.answer: Most RangeFit workouts require no equipment. Some optional workouts use basic items like resistance bands or light dumbbells, but bodyweight alternatives are always provided.

settings.question: How is this different from regular fitness apps?
settings.answer: RangeFit is specifically designed for people with PCOS, pre-diabetes, and insulin resistance. We focus on glucose-friendly workouts that stabilize energy rather than spike and crash it.

settings.question: What's included in the free 7-day plan?
settings.answer: The free plan includes 3 glucose-stabilizing workouts, an exercise timing guide, and an energy tracking sheet delivered instantly as a PDF.

settings.section_subtitle: Start your glucose-friendly fitness journey today. No credit card required.
settings.success_message: Your free 7-day workout plan is on its way to your inbox. Check your email (and spam folder) in the next few minutes.
